translation.geolocationDisabled: No access to geolocation. Please enable it on your device and try again.
translation.radiusInKm: Maximum distance from me {{ radius }} km
translation.mapUsage: Click on the button at the bottom right of the screen. It will set the trip start marker (red) to your current position (you may need to give permission for this). Move the green marker to the city you want to go to. You don't need to select an exact address or street - just place the marker roughly in the center of the town you want to go to.
translation.requestAdded: Application has been added! Please wait.
translation.withBaggageRefugeeOption1: Not much (everything will fit in a passenger car)
translation.withBaggageRefugeeOption2: Need a bigger car (a bus or something that can take more stuff)
translation.withBaggageRefugeeOption3: Need to deliver cargo (need a truck)
translation.contactData: Methods of contacting me (and any other information):
translation.contactDataPlaceholder: Here you need to enter your phone number, accounts in Internet messengers - anything that can be used to communicate with you. Describe your shipment (if delivery).
translation.driverRouteDeviation: I am available to deviate from the route by {{deviation}} km
translation.allowPets: I don't have a problem with pets:
translation.luggage: What I can do with luggage:
translation.iHavePassengerCar: I have a regular passenger car
translation.iHaveLargeCarOrBus: I have a large car or bus
translation.iHaveTruck: I have a truck (show delivery only)
translation.gdpr: This site uses cookies to allow the site to function. By agreeing, you give your consent for us to use them.
translation.gdpr1: Also, by agreeing, you accept the fact that this service is only an intermediary. It does not and cannot have any liability to you or to anyone else, either directly or indirectly. By agreeing, you assume any and all risks associated with the use of this site.
translation.gdpr2: We do not conduct any commercial activities and do not take any fees from the users of this service. All of this was created by people and for people and is delivered as is.
translation.gdpr3: We want to believe that soon there will be no room for hatred and pain in the world.
translation.needBigCarOrBus: Need a big car or bus
